remarks: The value of the explicit functional ` G ` is 1 at the ` X ` that determines it.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2014.)
statement:
dochfl1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochfl1.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochfl1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochfl1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochfl1.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dochfl1.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dochfl1.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochfl1.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dochfl1.r $e |- R = ( Base ` D ) $.
dochfl1.i $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` D ) $.
dochfl1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochfl1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochfl1.g $e |- G = ( v e. V |-> ( iota_ k e. R E. w e. ( ._|_ ` { X } ) v = ( w .+ ( k .x. X ) ) ) ) $.
dochfl1 $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` X ) = .1. ) $.
$d .+ k v w $.
$d .0. w $.
$d .1. k w $.
$d ._|_ k v w $.
$d .x. k v w $.
$d R k v $.
$d V v $.
$d X k v w $.
